subject: Re: Jeffrey Epstein Jeffrey Epstein is currently housed at MCC New York and not in a local hospital as has been reported. As with all inmates, for privacy and security reasons, we do not share information on an inmate's medical status or their conditions of confinement. body:
Jeffrey Epstein is currently housed at MCC New York and not in a local hospital as has been reported. As with
all inmates, for privacy and security reasons, we do not share information on an inmate's medical status or
their conditions of confinement.
Thanks
Office of Public Affairs
Information, Policy and Public Affairs Division
Federal Bureau of Prisons
(202) 514-6551 - phone
(202) 514-6620 - fax
